name: sbimi
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, w1)

body.origin: |- wi(wsb(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, w1)

comment: Distribute substitution over implication. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jun-1998.) Revise ~ df-sb . (Revised by BJ, 22-Dec-2020.) (Proof shortened by Steven Nguyen, 24-Jul-2023.)
